definition: rhinoceros horn, reputed to confer telepathic powers/fig. mutual sensitivity/tacit exchange of romantic feelings/a meeting of minds
hearts linked as one, just as the proverbial rhinoceros communicates emotion telepathically through his single horn (idiom); fig. two hearts beat as one
pinyin: xin1 you3 ling2 xi1 yi1 dian3 tong1

sentences.english: We should touch him let Xiao Hui help to save his father.
sentences.chinese: 灵犀让萧辉帮忙去救自己爹。

sentences.english: Musing, pondering, a breath, a briny tear, a dab of liquid or soil.
sentences.chinese: 灵犀，想仔细，一叹，咸苦之泪，轻拍土壤出清溪。

sentences.english: This time the husband and the wife finally reached a perfect mutual understanding.
sentences.chinese: 这次，夫妻俩终于心有灵犀一点通。
心有灵犀的最爱定会明白。

sentences.english: And the winds of the north, and the forests of oak and pine.
sentences.chinese: 北风随后吹舞，橡木松林啊掀灵犀。

sentences.english: There 's no greater joy in life than finding your soul mate .
sentences.chinese: 没有找到比你更快乐的人生灵犀。

sentences.english: Finally found, heart contain qinglv. ssjoke. com beauty.
sentences.chinese: 终于找到，心有灵犀的美好。

sentences.english: Even if I can't have its aroma, still I want to seize a bit inspiration enough.
sentences.chinese: 即使不能拥有她的香气，只要一点儿灵犀就足矣。

sentences.english: And even he can't read minds, only communicate telephathically.
sentences.chinese: 他甚至不会读心术，只会在沟通时心有灵犀罢了。

sentences.english: Let me not to the marriage of true minds admit impediment.
sentences.chinese: 让我无视那些障碍，不相信它会隔绝心中的灵犀。

sentences.english: Iknow you are an expert. Please feel free to order.
sentences.chinese: 你点的都是我喜欢的，是心有灵犀还是巧合呢？

sentences.english: Even though thousands of miles apart can also have consonance.
sentences.chinese: 即使相隔万里，也能心有灵犀。

sentences.english: Nothing is more hallowing than the union of kindred spirits in art.
sentences.chinese: 没有比艺术上的灵犀相通更神圣的东西了。

sentences.english: I really do like having friendships with ones I can connect with.
sentences.chinese: 我确实喜欢跟自己心有灵犀的人交朋友。

definition: Nichang, abbr. for the Tang Dynasty song "Raiment of Rainbows and Feathers" 霓裳羽衣曲[Ni2 chang2 yu3 yi1 qu1] or 霓裳羽衣舞[Ni2 chang2 yu3 yi1 wu3]
nichang, rainbow colored clothes worn by the Eight Immortals 八仙[Ba1 xian1]
to communicate with the spirits/psychic/(ears) sensitive/(information) accurate
the other end of the world/a faraway place
luan and phoenix/husband and wife/virtuous person/sovereign/belle
soul/mortal soul, i.e. attached to the body
